tasks.label: configure stt: arch-android-x86-64
tasks.command: cd syncthingtray; source android-env x86-64 && cmake --preset arch-android -DCMAKE_EXPORT_COMPILE_COMMANDS=1

tasks.label: configure stt: arch-android-aarch64
tasks.command: cd syncthingtray; source android-env aarch64 && cmake --preset arch-android -DCMAKE_EXPORT_COMPILE_COMMANDS=1

tasks.label: build stt: arch-android-x86-64
tasks.command: cd syncthingtray; source android-env x86-64 && cmake --build --preset arch-android

tasks.label: build stt: arch-android-aarch64
tasks.command: cd syncthingtray; source android-env aarch64 && cmake --build --preset arch-android
